creator: sw@empolis.co.uk
text:
Hi,

I am experiencing some strange behaviour when using FOP to generate PDF from
XML. I will attach a very simple test-case. 

When you have a fo:block element which has the letter-spacing and text-align
attributes set, the text inside this element is not displayed as expected in the
output PDF. The letter-spacing is applied as expected, but the alignment of the
text is incorrect. For example, if text-align="center" and letter-spacing="5pt"
the text is positioned off-center to the left.

I am happy to supply any further information as required.

Thanks
Stuart
